
# Markownify

![Thumbnail](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Markdownify is simple and effective markdown viewer. You can open any file in the markdown format and start viewing. Markdownify can also view HTML files.

## File Associations

### Markdown

- markdown
- mdown
- mkdn
- md
- mkd
- mdwn
- mdtxt
- mdtext
- text
- Rmd

### HTML

- html
- htm
- xhtml
- dhtml
- phtml
- jhtml
- mhtml
- rhtml
- shtml
- zhtml
